eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.ui

Class WauzPlayerBossBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.ui.WauzPlayerBossBar

  • public class WauzPlayerBossBar
extends java.lang.Object
    An UI class to show the player name and health of the targeted entity.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Constructor Detail

      • WauzPlayerBossBar

        public WauzPlayerBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                         java.util.List<MenacingModifier> modifiers,
                         double maxHealth,
                         boolean raidBoss)
        Creates a boss bar for the given entity. Also schedules a task to check if the entity and assigned players are still valid.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity, this bar belongs to.
        modifiers - Menacing modifiers shown in the bar.
        maxHealth - Max health shown in the bar.
        raidBoss - If the entity is a raid boss.
        See Also:
        doPlayerChecks()

    • Method Detail

      • getBossBar

        public static WauzPlayerBossBar getBossBar(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Parameters:
        entity - An entity with a boss bar.
        Returns:
        The boss bar of this entity, if existing.

      • clearBar

        public static void clearBar(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes the shown boss bar for the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should no longer see a boss bar.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                      double damage)
        Adds a player that should see this bar. If the entity will die from the damage, the bar will not be shown.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should see this bar.
        damage - The damage the player dealt to see the bar.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes a player that should no longer see this bar.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should no longer see this bar.

      • updateBossBar

        public void updateBossBar(double damage)
        Updates the boss bar, because the entity got damaged. If the entity will die from the damage, the bar be destroyed.
        Parameters:
        damage - The damage that was dealt to the entity.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle(int health)
        Generates a new title for the boss bar.
        Parameters:
        health - How much health is left.
        Returns:
        The new title.

      • doPlayerChecks

        private void doPlayerChecks()
        Schedules a task to check if the entity and assigned players are still valid. If not, they get removed, else the task is scheduled again for the next second. Also spawns the circling particles arount the entity.
        See Also:
        ParticleSpawner.spawnParticleCircle(org.bukkit.Location, SkillParticle, double, int), destroy()

      • destroy

        private void destroy()
        Removes this boss bar from all maps and clears out all players.
